endpoints.description: The Search API allows you to perform the same search that is available within Trello at the top of the window. This means that you can use modifiers such as within the query to modify the results you get back. For more information on modifiers, click "Learn More" within the Trello search popup. Certain types of modifiers will restrict the types of objects that are returned with your search. One example of this is the modifier which will meant that your search will only contain .
